code: public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {     LOG.info("About to run splunk-camel integration...").     CamelContext camelContext = new DefaultCamelContext().     camelContext.addRoutes(new SplunkPublishEventRouteBuilder()).     ProducerTemplate eventProducer = camelContext.createProducerTemplate().     camelContext.start().     eventProducer.request("direct:start", new SplunkEventProcessor()).     LOG.info("Successfully published event to Splunk.").     camelContext.stop(). }
